pullrequest.title: [Blueprint] Service to add performers at runtime

content.raw: I don't think this is thread safe. `OnAddPerformer` is called from a separate thread and I would advise not to call anything on `EntityComponentManager` from this thread. My recommendation would be to store the the `_req` in a queue and process it in `UpdateLevelState`. I realize this means we won't be able to return anything meaningful, but I don't think we can help it right now.
